Package ca.cgjennings.spelling.ui

Class LookupServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.spelling.ui.LookupServices
  • public class LookupServices
extends Object
    A registry of lookup service providers.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  LookupServices.ServiceRegistrationListener
      An event listener that is notified when a look-up service is registered or unregistered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addServiceRegistrationListener​(LookupServices.ServiceRegistrationListener srl)
      Adds a listener that will be informed of registration events.
      static LookupServiceProvider[] getLookupServices()
      Returns an array of the registered lookup services.
      static void registerLookupProvider​(LookupServiceProvider serviceProvider)
      Register a lookup service that can be used to provide dictionary or thesaurus services through the spelling checker.
      static void removeServiceRegistrationListener​(LookupServices.ServiceRegistrationListener srl)
      Removes a listener so that it will no longer be informed of registration events.
      static LookupServiceProvider selectLookupService​(Locale locale)
      Returns an array of registered lookup servicse appropriate for the specified locale, or returns null if no matching service is registered.
      static void unregisterLookupProvider​(LookupServiceProvider serviceProvider)
      Unregister a lookup service.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • registerLookupProvider

        public static void registerLookupProvider​(LookupServiceProvider serviceProvider)
        Register a lookup service that can be used to provide dictionary or thesaurus services through the spelling checker.
        Parameters:
        serviceProvider - the service provider to register

      • unregisterLookupProvider

        public static void unregisterLookupProvider​(LookupServiceProvider serviceProvider)
        Unregister a lookup service.
        Parameters:
        serviceProvider - the service provider to register

      • selectLookupService

        public static LookupServiceProvider selectLookupService​(Locale locale)
        Returns an array of registered lookup servicse appropriate for the specified locale, or returns null if no matching service is registered.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to match
        Returns:
        a service provider that supports the locale, or null

      • getLookupServices

        public static LookupServiceProvider[] getLookupServices()
        Returns an array of the registered lookup services.
        Returns:
        a possibly empty array of the currently registered services

      • addServiceRegistrationListener

        public static void addServiceRegistrationListener​(LookupServices.ServiceRegistrationListener srl)
        Adds a listener that will be informed of registration events.
        Parameters:
        srl - the listener

      • removeServiceRegistrationListener

        public static void removeServiceRegistrationListener​(LookupServices.ServiceRegistrationListener srl)
        Removes a listener so that it will no longer be informed of registration events.
        Parameters:
        srl - the listener
